attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After hearing on the news this morning that the Goverment want to slip in yet another stealth tax on our very expensive council tax charging us for having a patio in our garden!!, a view or a shed, we work hard as a nation & want to enjoy our garden after working all week, we are taxed higher that any other country in Europe but this is absurd!! people will not pay yet another back door stealth tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
